languages.text: "Все несет угрозу. Когда-то впервые лазружье взорвалось в руках хозяина. Когда-то впервые циклонная торпеда обрушилась на праведный мир. Когда-то праведным бинарным языком была изречена ересь. Ничто могущественное не безопасно".

"There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."
languages.original_text: "Все несет угрозу. Когда-то впервые лазружье взорвалось в руках хозяина. Когда-то впервые циклонная торпеда обрушилась на праведный мир. Когда-то праведным бинарным языком была изречена ересь. Ничто могущественное не безопасно".

traits.locale_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binary language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “万事万物都可能会带来威胁。激光枪可能会在使用者的手中爆炸，旋风鱼雷可能会落在善良的人们居住的世界上，神圣的二进制语言可能会说出异端言论。只要是拥有巨大力量的东西，都无法保证绝对安全。”
languages.original_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."

traits.locale_text: “万事万物都可能会带来威胁。激光枪可能会在使用者的手中爆炸，旋风鱼雷可能会落在善良的人们居住的世界上，神圣的二进制语言可能会说出异端言论。只要是拥有巨大力量的东西，都无法保证绝对安全。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Todo puede ser una amenaza. Hubo una primera vez para que un rifle láser explotara en manos de su usuario. Hubo una primera vez para que un torpedo ciclónico asolara un mundo virtuoso. Hubo una primera vez para que se pronunciara herejía en el sagrado binario. Si algo alberga un gran poder, nunca es del todo seguro».
languages.original_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."

traits.locale_text: «Todo puede ser una amenaza. Hubo una primera vez para que un rifle láser explotara en manos de su usuario. Hubo una primera vez para que un torpedo ciclónico asolara un mundo virtuoso. Hubo una primera vez para que se pronunciara herejía en el sagrado binario. Si algo alberga un gran poder, nunca es del todo seguro».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「あらゆるものは脅威となりえるものだ。かつてラスガンが初めて持ち主の手の中で爆発した。サイクロン・トルピードが初めて徳の高い世界に落ちたこともあった。神聖なバイナリック語で初めて異端が語られたこともある。大きな力を持つものは決して安全ではないのだ」
languages.original_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆるものは脅威となりえるものだ。かつてラスガンが初めて持ち主の手の中で爆発した。サイクロン・トルピードが初めて徳の高い世界に落ちたこともあった。神聖なバイナリック語で初めて異端が語られたこともある。大きな力を持つものは決して安全ではないのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "In allem liegt eine Bedrohung. Irgendwann ist zum ersten Mal ein Lasergewehr in den Händen seines Eigentümers explodiert. Irgendwann ist zum ersten Mal ein Zyklonentorpedo über eine tugendhafte Welt hereingebrochen. Irgendwann wurden zum ersten Mal im heiligen Binhärsprech ketzerische Worte gesprochen. Nichts von großer Macht ist jemals ungefährlich."
languages.original_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."

traits.locale_text: "In allem liegt eine Bedrohung. Irgendwann ist zum ersten Mal ein Lasergewehr in den Händen seines Eigentümers explodiert. Irgendwann ist zum ersten Mal ein Zyklonentorpedo über eine tugendhafte Welt hereingebrochen. Irgendwann wurden zum ersten Mal im heiligen Binhärsprech ketzerische Worte gesprochen. Nichts von großer Macht ist jemals ungefährlich."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « D'une certaine manière, tout peut renfermer une menace. Un fusil laser explosant entre les mains de son propriétaire. Une torpille cyclonique s'abattant sur un monde vertueux. Une hérésie prononcée dans le langage binhaire sacré. Plus une chose est puissante, plus elle est dangereuse. »
languages.original_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."

traits.locale_text: « D'une certaine manière, tout peut renfermer une menace. Un fusil laser explosant entre les mains de son propriétaire. Une torpille cyclonique s'abattant sur un monde vertueux. Une hérésie prononcée dans le langage binhaire sacré. Plus une chose est puissante, plus elle est dangereuse. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."

languages.text: "Her şey bünyesinde tehdit barındırır. Bir silazer, sahibinin elinde ilk kez patladı. Bir siklonik torpido, doğruluğu takip eden bir dünyaya ilk kez düştü. Kutsal ikilidilde ilk kez kâfirce sözler sarf edildi. Büyük güç barındıran hiçbir şey asla güvenli değildir."
languages.original_text: "There is a threat in everything. A lasgun once exploded in its owner's hands for the first time. A cyclonic torpedo once fell on a virtuous world for the first time. Heresy was once uttered in the sacred binharic language for the first time. No thing of great power is ever safe."

traits.locale_text: "Her şey bünyesinde tehdit barındırır. Bir silazerin, sahibinin elinde ilk kez patlaması durumu yaşandı. Bir siklonik torpidonun, doğruluğu takip eden bir dünyaya ilk kez düşmesi durumu yaşandı. Kutsal ikilidilde, ilk kez kâfirce sözler sarf edilmesi durumu yaşandı. Büyük güç barındıran hiçbir şey asla güvenli değildir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
